attributes.action: Call on David Cameron to resign from office
attributes.background: David Cameron has repeatedly lied to the British public and has continually condemned immoral tax avoidance, whilst at the same time he is profiting from his own fathers offshore scheme.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
